title: Deploy authentication service
description: Deploy the new authentication service to production with OAuth2 support and session management.

title: Fix CI pipeline timeout
description: The CI pipeline is timing out on the integration test stage. Need to optimize test parallelism.

title: Add monitoring dashboards
description: Set up Grafana dashboards for the new microservices. Include latency, error rate, and throughput panels.

title: Update API documentation
description: API docs are out of date after the v3 migration. Need to regenerate OpenAPI spec and update examples.

title: Refactor database utilities
description: Extract common query patterns into a shared utility package. Reduce duplication across services.

title: Write integration tests for auth
description: Full integration test suite for the authentication service including OAuth flows and token refresh.

title: Performance optimization sprint
description: Identify and resolve top 5 performance bottlenecks across the platform. Target 50% latency reduction.

title: Migrate user preferences to new schema
Fix memory leak in WebSocket handler
close_reason: Root cause: unbounded channel buffer. Fixed with ring buffer.
